articles.description: Nottingham Forest striker Taiwo Awoniyi is in an induced coma after undergoing the first phase of surgery on a serious abdominal injury.
articles.title: Taiwo Awoniyi: Nottingham Forest striker in induced coma after surgery

articles.description: A tale of two headers - a pair of big moments in either box decide Sunderland's Championship play-off semi-final against Coventry.
articles.title: Sunderland 1-1 Coventry (3-2 agg): Two key moments in Black Cats win

articles.description: Everton cancel plans to demolish Goodison Park and will make the stadium home to their women's team.
articles.title: Goodison Park: Everton's women's team to use stadium as new home as demolition cancelled

articles.description: Rory McIlroy's start to 2025 is impressing his fellow pros as they prepare for the US PGA Championship at Quail Hollow, a course the Northern Irishman has won at four times.
articles.title: US PGA Championship: Scheffler, Spieth, DeChambeau on McIlroy's form at Quail Hollow

articles.description: Sampdoria are relegated to Serie C for the first time in their 78-year history after a season dogged by managerial upheaval.
articles.title: Sampdoria relegated to Serie C for first time in Genoa-based club's history

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti says he has "never had a problem" with the club and does not want to "make a big deal" out of his impending departure for the Brazil national team.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti 'never had a problem' with Real Madrid

articles.description: Why did some Liverpool fans boo Trent Alexander-Arnold when he came on against Arsenal on Sunday? BBC Sport canvasses opinion.
articles.title: Why did Liverpool fans boo Trent Alexander-Arnold vs Arsenal?

articles.description: Build-up followed by live text commentary as Sunderland host Coventry in the second leg of the Championship play-off semi-final.
articles.title: Sunderland vs Coventry City LIVE: Championship play-off score & latest updates

articles.description: Nottingham Forest Forest deny there was a confrontation between owner Evangelos Marinakis and manager Nuno Espirito Santo after Sunday's Premier League draw with Leicester.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest deny confrontation between owner Evangelos Marinakis and Nuno Espirito Santo calling the reaction to it 'fake news'

articles.description: Bradley Wiggins' admission that he was addicted to cocaine after retiring from cycling is a sad chapter in a story that had brought troubles to go with the glory. BBC Sport's Matt Warwick examines Wiggins' character.
articles.title: Bradley Wiggins: Sadness at troubled times for cycling great
